snippet: Denis Menchov won the punishing 20th stage of the Vuelta a España while Alberto Contador kept the overall leader’s red jersey to all but clinch his second title.
abstract: Cyclist Denis Menchov wins the 20th stage of the Vuelta a Espana bicycle race while Alberto Contador keeps the overall leader’s red jersey to all but clinch his second title.
lead_paragraph: Denis Menchov won the punishing 20th stage of the Vuelta a España while Alberto Contador kept the overall leader’s red jersey to all but clinch his second title.

headline.seo: Alberto Contador Keeps Lead in Vuelta a España
